#NFL 2019-2020 EDA 

#Phil Ramontal


#Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

#Data Import
```{r}
nfl_19 <- read.csv("pbp-2019.csv")
nfl_19

nfl19 <- nfl_19 [,3:38]

```
#Subset by down
```{r}
nfl1 <- subset(nfl19, OffenseTeam == "KC")
nfl2 <- subset(nfl19, OffenseTeam == "SF")
nfl <- rbind(nfl1, nfl2)
```
#Plot 1
```{r}
ggplot(nfl1, mapping = aes(x = Formation, fill = PlayType)) + geom_bar() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))  + labs(x = "Formations", y = "Number of plays") + ggtitle("Chiefs Plays Per Formation")
```

```{r}
ggplot(nfl2 , mapping = aes(x = Formation, fill = PlayType)) + geom_bar() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) + labs(x = "Formations", y = "Number of plays") + ggtitle("49er's Plays Per Formation")
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
sample( )
```
